details.title: Erland's plugins and applets (ALPHA testing versions)

plugin.name: CustomScan
plugin.title: Custom Scan *Alpha*
plugin.desc: *** ALPHA VERSION ***. Make it easier to develop modules that retreive additional information about artist, album, tracks from somehere. If used together with Custom Browse plugin, the included scanning modules for LastFM and custom tags makes it possible to browse music by LastFM tags or by a custom tag. (Boom, Transporter, Classic, Receiver, Controller, Radio, Touch, SoftSqueeze, SqueezePlay)
plugin.changes: - Updated so tag mapping tags can be used in a later tag mapping entry - Corrected so tags with space in their name works with tag mapping entries
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson
